Uses of Package
project4

  • Classes in project4 used by project4
    Class Description
    Coffee
    This class extends the MenuItem class and contains common attributes and operations specific to an instance of a coffee
    Customizable
    This interface will be implemented by classes that will involve an addition or removal of an instance of an object
    Donut
    This class extends the MenuItem class and contains common attributes and operations specific to an instance of a donut
    DonutOrder
    This class represents a Donut container that contains instances of the Donut class
    MainMenuController
    Class that will handle all the user input and output made in the Main Menu
    MenuItem
    This class represents an instance of an item on the menu and defines common attributes for all MenuItem subclasses
    Order
    This class represents an Order container that contains instances of MenuItems classes
    StoreOrders
    This class represents a StoreOrder container that will contain instances of various orders made by the customers
